description: Rank and update pacman mirrorlist using reflector. Supports country filtering, protocol selection, and various sort methods.

optional_env.name: MIRROR_LIMIT
optional_env.description: Number of mirrors to include in the list

optional_env.name: MIRROR_SORT
optional_env.description: Sort method: rate, age, country, or score

optional_env.name: MIRROR_COUNTRY
optional_env.description: Two-letter country code to filter mirrors

optional_env.name: MIRROR_PROTOCOL
optional_env.description: Protocol filter: https, http, or ftp
